description: Number of integral points in a certain sequence of closed quadrilaterals.
references: Ehrhart, Eugene; Deux corollaires de la loi de reciprocite du polyedre rationnel. C. R. Acad. Sci. Paris Ser. A-B 265 1967 A160-A162.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: E. Ehrhart, Deux corollaires de la loi de reciprocite du polyedre rationnel, C. R. Acad. Sci. Paris Ser. A-B 265 1967 A160-A162. [Annotated scanned copy]
formula: Ehrhart (1967) gives a g.f. on page 161.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
